argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_picn | |- _pi e. CC |
| 2 |  | #P_subcl | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ _pi e. CC ) -> ( A - _pi ) e. CC ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( A e. CC -> ( A - _pi ) e. CC ) |
| 4 |  | #P_efival | |- ( ( A - _pi ) e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. ( A - _pi ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` ( A - _pi ) ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` ( A - _pi ) ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. ( A - _pi ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` ( A - _pi ) ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` ( A - _pi ) ) ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_coscl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_axicn | |- _i e. CC |
| 8 |  | #P_sincl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 9 |  | #P_mulcl | |- ( ( _i e. CC /\ ( sin ` A ) e. CC ) -> ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 10 | 7, 8, 9 | #P_sylancr | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) e. CC ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_negdid | |- ( A e. CC -> -u ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) = ( -u ( cos ` A ) + -u ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_cosmpi | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` ( A - _pi ) ) = -u ( cos ` A ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_sinmpi | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` ( A - _pi ) ) = -u ( sin ` A ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _i x. ( sin ` ( A - _pi ) ) ) = ( _i x. -u ( sin ` A ) ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_mulneg2 | |- ( ( _i e. CC /\ ( sin ` A ) e. CC ) -> ( _i x. -u ( sin ` A ) ) = -u ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 8, 15 | #P_sylancr | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _i x. -u ( sin ` A ) ) = -u ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) |
| 17 | 14, 16 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( _i x. ( sin ` ( A - _pi ) ) ) = -u ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) |
| 18 | 12, 17 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( cos ` ( A - _pi ) ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` ( A - _pi ) ) ) ) = ( -u ( cos ` A ) + -u ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 19 | 11, 18 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( A e. CC -> -u ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) = ( ( cos ` ( A - _pi ) ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` ( A - _pi ) ) ) ) ) |
| 20 | 5, 19 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. ( A - _pi ) ) ) = -u ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 21 |  | #P_efival | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) = ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_negeqd | |- ( A e. CC -> -u ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) = -u ( ( cos ` A ) + ( _i x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 23 | 20, 22 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( exp ` ( _i x. ( A - _pi ) ) ) = -u ( exp ` ( _i x. A ) ) ) |
